external_games.name: VRC PRO International Oval On-road tracks Deluxe

name: VRC Pro: International Oval On-Road Tracks Deluxe
summary: This VRC PRO International Oval On-road tracks Deluxe pack gives you 4 additional, real existing international high-speed oval on-road RC tracks. Expand your outdoor oval on-road tracks selection, experience real existing world class tracks , and join more events & more multiplayer sessions
